@celticwdlust... If you're heading to Mill anyway, get the ferry over from Tobermory 👍 The scenery is beautiful!
@celticwdlust You can either take the Coran ferry from the mainland (nr Fort William) over to the peninsula or...
Check this out. Ardnamurchan Lighthouse - the most westerly point on the UK mainland. I visited in August last year… https://t.co/PMz2KWVmmp
@FunkyEllas Sounds like a plan, thanks! The way we went wasn't the prettiest in parts. I love all the wee colourful fishing villages :-)
@GeoMcC1978 @D_F_Lyons @AnCridhe We've actually looked into this George, and might book up for October.
@BeverlyRayG Nice one! I love all the cute wee towns and villages in Fife :-)
@Kimkjaerside Thanks Kim! I hope you and your wee family had a lovely Christmas and New Year
@jester_mouse I can't wait to go back and do more, as some of the route we did wasn't overly scenic. Still a good walk though!
First walk of 2017 DONE! Fife Coastal Path - Kirkcaldy > Kinghorn > Burntisland > Aberdour. 15+ miles the whole day… https://t.co/BIiFWoENyP
@D_F_Lyons Thanks for all of this. I'm taking screen shots as I'll never remember it all! 😄
@Lucinda_Dixon @Madaboutravel Lovely photos! 😍 The islands are the best place in the world 🌍
@D_F_Lyons It'll be towards the end of September, probably 5 or 6 days at the most. Thanks so much! Looking at the Coll Bunkhouse 😃
@D_F_Lyons @TheHebrides @CalMacFerries @VisitScotland ... I'll pester you for some tips when I get booked up. Thanks 😄
@D_F_Lyons @TheHebrides @CalMacFerries @VisitScotland Thanks for that burst of excitement. I was swaying towards Coll actually...

@MelsNextChapter @LagavulinWhisky Brilliant eh? Locals on Islay who said funding for community projects was lacking so this is great 👍

@b3thany Ooooh I know! It's a great way to start another year of adventures 🔥 Woo hoo! 😄

@TheEdinburgers @HaggisTours @NLFerries @PromoteShetland @bbcshetland @shetlandtimes @UpHellyAa Thanks so much! I can't wait 😄
@RobinW59 What a wonderful place to grow up. I've only visited once before for the day. Aaaw, that's some birthday celebration! 🎉 🔥
@davidjbrodie Oh that would be cool! Let me know if you're going @whiskyandtartan 👍 😄
@Kimkjaerside @HaggisTours Thanks Kim! I'm super-excited 😬 I'll be sharing lots of photos, and I'll let you know how I get on!
@RobinW59 I do feel very lucky to be going Robin 😄 it's been on my wish list for aaaages!
